Allen St. N. from, but not including, Hester to G[rand?]
About 19[??]
715917f.folder: Allen Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

715913f-a.text:
40-54 Allen Street, east side, north from Hester Street to, but
not including, Grand Street.
April 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
715913f-a.folder: Allen Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

715914f-a.text:
41-65 Allen Street, west side, from Hester to Grand Streets. The number 97, seen in the foreground, is the Hester Street number of
the corner building.
January 16, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
715914f-a.folder: Allen Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

715915f-a.text:
43-65 Allen Street, west side, from Hester to Grand Streets, as seen from the clearing on the north side of Hester Street.
November 5, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
715915f-a.folder: Allen Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

720417f-a.text:
Hester Street, between Allen and Orchard Streets, Manhattan
Federal Art Project
"Changing New York"
Berenice Abbott, photographer
Neg. No. L-2
[Note: negative at Museum of the City of New York]
Code III B-1
May 3, 1935[or '38 - illegible]
720417f-a.folder: Hester Street & Allen Street., Manhattan, NY

715918f-b.text:
(1)
Allen Street, east side, north from Hester to Grand Streets.
October 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date and showing parkway dividing traffic lanes
after street widening.
September 25, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
